title: Lenovo 400 USB-C Compact Wired Mouse, Black
features: The perfect ultrabook companion, the Lenovo 400 USB-C Wired Compact Mouse is lightweight, small enough to carry in a pocket, and totally portable
Enjoy hassle-free connectivity – just plug in the USB-C mouse and you're ready to go with no need to worry about dongles or batteries
Great for on-the-go productivity, this compact, portable mouse has a precise red optical sensor that lets you instantly adjust the DPI on the fly to increase your accuracy and productivity
The Lenovo 400 USB-C mouse is designed to be used comfortably in the left or right hand; this ambidextrous mouse sits perfectly in the palm of your hand and is comfortable for extended use
Compatible with any system with a USB-C port, this wired mouse supports Windows 10, Windows 11, and Chrome OS
description: Pocket-friendly sized and totally portable, the Lenovo 400 USB-C Wired Compact Mouse is designed for those who live life on the go. No batteries required, simply plug in the USB-C cable, and you're ready to scroll and click away – it's plug-and-play, so there's nothing to download or install. Featuring an advanced red optical sensor and up to 2400 on-the-fly DPI adjustment, precision and accuracy is guaranteed whether you are working on the smaller screen of a notebook computer or a large monitor.Designed for comfort, this four-button USB-C mouse fits perfectly in the palm of your right or left hand, and when you're on the go, it slips easily into the pocket of your laptop bag. Never worry about replacing batteries or problems with connecting, whether you're at the office, working from home, on a laptop at your favorite coffee shop, or studying in a college dorm room. The Lenovo 400 USB-C Wired Compact Mouse is made for everyone who needs a simple to use, lightweight computer mouse with precise accuracy and zero latency.SPECIFICATIONS: Sensor Resolution: On-the-fly DPI button - 800, 1600, 2400 adjustableButtons: Left click, right click, scroll click, DPIDimensions: 3.78" x 2.20" x 1.38"
